doc:
Arthur Hoyt https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arthur_Hoyt 0 Arthur Hoyt (March 19, 1874 – January 4, 1953) was an American film character actor who appeared in more than 275 films in his 34-year film career, about a third of them silent films. He was a brother of Harry O. Hoyt. Arthur_Hoyt ( March_19_,_1874 – January_4_,_1953 ) was an_American_film_character_actor who appeared in more_than_275_films in his_34-year_film_career , about_a_third of them silent_films . He was a_brother of Harry_O._Hoyt .
